abstracts: I am currently a research fellow at East China Normal University, Department of Mathematics. I received my PhD from National University of Singapore in April 2018 under the supervision of De-Qi Zhang. From 2018-2019, I am a postdoc at Max Planck Instute for Mathematics (Germany). From 2019-2022, I am a research fellow at Korea Institute for Advanced Study. I am working in algebraic geometry, birational geometry, dynamical system. Current program: classification of surjective endomorphisms and the applications in arithmetic dynamics, like Kawaguchi-Silverman conjecture and Zariski dense orbit conjecture. Basic requirements for Master (PHD) students who want to follow my research: Finish Hartshorne GTM052, Chapter I & II, including exercises. Further supervision plan: Birational Geometry of Algebraic Varieties, Kollar & Mori.
